title: external nccl breaks gloo compilation
body_html:
Currently, you can have a libnccl on your system, and pytorch setup favors that instead of compiling one itself from source. The code that takes care of this is:
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/setup.py#L316-L318

However, this breaks gloo build because gloo gets a path to NCCL via: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/build_libs.sh#L40
